summary: Unit tests for the MODFLOW 6 Constant Head (CHD) package integration in the iMod library, covering creation, concatenation of layered packages, reading from files, conversion from iMod5 formats, rendering of package data, handling of concentration values, writing period data, and validation of data types.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of CHD package processing within iMod's MODFLOW 6 workflow, ensuring accurate data handling, compatibility with legacy formats, correct rendering, and robust error detection for groundwater modeling applications.
